channel.title: Year-End-Review on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Year-End-Review on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Templated Annual Review 2023
item.description: How it started I’ve been wanting to write an end-of-year review for a while, but I kept putting it off. Then, I came across this simple template and I finally decided to give it a shot. Starting with a template always makes things easier. 3 grateful things Local Communities (Bitcoin, Ferment, Chinese language exchange) I am an introvert, but I do enjoy spending time with others who share similar interests. This year, I have primarily connected with people through my involvement in the Bitcoin community, a fermentation group, and a Chinese language exchange group.
